Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: set default value for a variable
Issue.description: Earlier versions of ansible (< 2.4.0.0) provides a variable value by default. Newer versions do not provide that any more. This causes an error when ansible version 2.4.0.0 or above is used. Need to fix that problem so that ansible agent can use any version greater than 2.3.0.0.
